item.title: Chess Programming Basics
item.description: Curiosity One fun aspect of parenting is revisiting things you learnt as a child, as the teacher. Since putting a chess board somewhat prominantly at home the eldest has expressed some interest and learnt a few moves. We bought a chess book aimed for a young audiance to see the game taught gently, and I found myself learning more than expected. Once down the rabbit hole of chess, I started to read about the early chess computers, and particularly those with bespoke hardware/software.
